ComicInfo.Title: Part III: The Ex-X-Men
ComicInfo.Summary:
SynopsisDeadpool continues to strike down hero after hero in a post-apocalyptic world!
PlotTaskmaster is on the trail of a murderous more insane, Deadpool. He has witnessed the carnage that is Deadpool killing Madrox, Green Goblin, and Power Pack, the last is the straw that breaks Taskmaster's back and he realizes how insane Wade has gone.
Somewhere else, Deadpool has kidnapped Professor X and has had Arcade make a deathtrap house to capture the X-men come to rescue their leader. The deathtrap house works and kills Scott, Emma, Sam and Pixie in one boobytrap and Colossus, Rogue and Gambit in another. Deadpool then lets Charles attempt to read Deadpool's mind and another trap is sprung causing the powerful psychic mind to be wiped. Deadpool then hunts down Wolverine and kills him with a Carbonadium sword.
Meanwhile, Taskmaster comes across the dead bodies of Dr. Stange and Wong and learns that Deadpool is planning on killing the Multiverse itself.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:15:38. [CVDB351090]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jordan D. White, Nick Lowe
ComicInfo.Characters: Arcade, Beast, Cannonball, Colossus, Cyclops, Daken, Deadpool, Doctor Strange, Emma Frost, Gambit, Kitty Pryde, Madrox, Magneto, Norman Osborn, Pixie, Professor X, Rogue, Taskmaster, Venom, Wolverine, Wong, X-23
ComicInfo.Locations: Murderworld, Nexus of All Realities, Sanctum Sanctorum
